findings.rationale: The five-year duration may not be sufficient for certain types of sensitive information, potentially exposing the Disclosing Party to risks after the agreement expires.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect for a period of five (5) years from the date of execution.

findings.rationale: The focus on injunctive relief without monetary damages may not adequately compensate the Disclosing Party for potential losses, leading to insufficient deterrence against breaches.
findings.evidence_quote: the Disclosing Party shall be entitled to seek injunctive relief without posting bond or other security.

findings.rationale: Restricting assignment may hinder business flexibility and growth, particularly during changes in ownership, which can complicate future transactions.
findings.evidence_quote: Neither party may assign this Agreement without the prior written consent of the other party
